Key Match Events: The Sacramento Kings led the Golden State Warriors by 15 points at the end of the first quarter, and took as much as a 39-point lead before winning 129-99.
Post-Match Reflections: Steph Curry was very honest about how this Warriors squad is not built to come back from large deficits, such as the one they faced on Sunday.
Others: Steph Curry scored 26 points on 8-12 shooting, but it was his first game since March 2018 with zero assists. The Warriors turned the ball over 22 times in Sunday's loss.
